attributes.action: Introduce a Windfall Tax on Energy Companies in 2022
attributes.additional_details: Scrap the Loan and introduce a Windfall Tax
attributes.background:
1    Scrap the £200 Loan in  October  2022 which is a Debt to all UK households which people cannot afford or want .
2 Introduce a Windfall Tax in 2022 on the  Huge Profits and Dividends  on Large Energy Companies like BP and Shell

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Tax 50% of the Energy Companies profits to help households pay bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607983

Allow consumers the right to refuse the £200 energy rebate: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608007
